A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson gives a refreshing take on a franchise that's hard-pressed for new elements after being in the spotlight since 1977. The film brings a few interesting spins on the Star Wars universe\, but remains rooted in the classic pieces of the saga. Throw in a couple of genuinely unexpected moments and you've got a fun\, visually stunning\, and intense movie that stands tall to its predecessors. Don't believe the low-star reviews; if you enjoy Star Wars\, you'll definitely enjoy The Last Jedi.
